title: me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No. 23
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign 

Driving Licences — New Zealand and Taiwan) (Amendment) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic (recognition foreign driving licence -- new zealand taiwan) (amendment) order 2023

title: me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No. 23
heading: 2. The Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign Driving Licences — New
text_raw:
2. The Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign Driving Licences — New 

Zealand and Taiwan) Order 2010 (S.I. No. 402 of 2010) is amended – 

(a) 

by the insertion of the following Article after Article 1: 

In this Order ‘Act of 1961’ means the Road Traffic Act 

“1A. 
1961 (No. 24 of 1961).”, 

and 

(b) by the substitution of the following Article for Article 3: 

“3. 

This Order does not apply to – 

(a) 

a licence or permit issued by the competent 
authority of New Zealand in exchange for a 
licence or permit issued by a state other than – 

(i) 

the State, 

(ii) 

another Member State, 

(iii) 

the Republic of China (Taiwan), or 

(iv) any other state in respect of which an order 
under section 23A of the Act of 1961 
applies, 

and 

(b) 

a licence or permit issued by the competent 
authority of the Republic of China (Taiwan) in 
exchange for a licence or permit issued by a state 
other than – 

(i) 

the State, 

(ii) 

another Member State, 

(iii) New Zealand, or 

(iv) any other state in respect of which an order 
under section 23A of the Act of 1961 
applies.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [247] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 May, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [247]

title: me by section 23A (inserted by section 8 of the Road Traffic Act 2006 (No. 23
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign Driving Licences 
- New Zealand and Taiwan) Order 2010 (S.I. No. 402 of 2010) to allow for the 
recognition of Australian driving licences for exchange, following the 
introduction of the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign Driving Licence) 
(Australia) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 158 of 2023). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [247] 5
